About Advertising in School - CAMBRIDGE HIGH SCHOOL, Badi Chowdi, Hyderabad

Advertising in School - CAMBRIDGE HIGH SCHOOL, Badi Chowdi, Hyderabad would provide advertisers with an opportunity to reach out to students with relevant products and meaningful brand messages. Brands have the option to select more schools and colleges across locations and cities and customize their campaigns to suit their brand needs. Though the most popular advertising option for school advertising is through kiosk promotion, brands have also opted for customized brand campaigns like the following: Product demonstration in school assembly Brand awareness campaigns among school children Conducting school/district/state-level contests Fundraising/Lead-generation programs If you are looking for such customized campaigns for schools, contact us at Help@TheMediaAnt.com for more details.
